belonging or relating to a group of people who invaded northern India about 4,000 years ago and spoke an Indo-European language: This area has a long history that predates the Aryan invasions of India.
belonging or relating to a group of white people with pale hair and blue eyes, believed by Nazis to be better than other groups

one of a group of people who invaded northern India about 4,000 years ago and spoke an Indo-European language: The Rig-Veda is an ancient Sanskrit text of the Aryans.
someone who belongs to a group of white people with pale hair and blue eyes, believed by Nazis to be better than other groups
More examplesFewer examplesThe Aryans began taking control of regions in north India. Later, the invading Aryans are said to have forced the Dravidians to move to the south of the country.
